## log() function

Log function. Only works in debug mode, otherwise it does nothing.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function log(...args: any[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  args | <code>any[]</code> | any loggable parameter |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
